params.ranges_: list of range to get underlying info about.

returns.amount0s: amounts of underlying of token 0 of LPs.
returns.amount1s: amounts of underlying of token 1 of LPs.

params.ranges_: list of range to get underlying info about.

returns.amount0s: amounts of underlying of token 1 of LPs.
returns.amount1s: amounts of underlying of token 1 of LPs.
returns.fee0s: amounts of fees of token 0 of LPs.
returns.fee1s: amounts of fees of token 1 of LPs.

params.vault_: Arrakis V2 vault to get liquidity in ranges for

returns.liquidities: list of ranges and amount of liquidity in each

params.vault_: Arrakis V2 vault to get underlying info about.

returns.amount0: amount of underlying of token 0 of LPs.
returns.amount1: amount of underlying of token 1 of LPs.

params.vault_: Arrakis V2 vault to get underlying info about.

returns.amount0: amount of underlying of token 0 of LPs.
returns.amount1: amount of underlying of token 1 of LPs.
returns.fee0: amount of fee of token 0 of LPs.
returns.fee1: amount of fee of token 0 of LPs.

params.vault_: Arrakis V2 vault to get underlying info about.

returns.underlying: struct containing underlying amounts of token0 and token1, fees of token0 and token1, finally leftover on vault of token0 and token1.

devdoc.title: ArrakisV2Helper helpers for querying common info about ArrakisV2 vaults

token0AndToken1ByRange((int24,int24,uint.notice: get underlyings of token0 and token1 in two lists.

token0AndToken1PlusFeesByRange((int24,in.notice: get underlyings and fees of token0 and token1 in two lists.

totalLiquidity(address).notice: get liquidity in all uniswap v3 ranges

totalUnderlyingWithFees(address).notice: get total underlying, also returns uncollected fees separately.

totalUnderlyingWithFeesAndLeftOver(addre.notice: get total underlying, also returns uncollected fees and leftover separatly.
